content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-18.5, 19.5)
Consists of steam engine (position -18.5, 19.5), boiler (position -13.5, 20.0), and offshore pump (position -11.5, 26.5). The steam engine is connected to the boiler via pipes, which transport steam generated from the boiler.

### Copper plate mine at position(5.0, -73.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position 5.0, -73.0) and a furnace (position 5.0, -73.0)
  
### Copper plate factory at position(-18.0, -49.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position -18.0, -49.0) and a furnace (position -18.0, -49.0)

### Lab at position(-17.5, 23.5)
Consists of a lab (position -17.5, 23.5) that is currently not conducting any research.

### Assembling machine at position(-21.5, 25.5)
Consists of an assembling machine (position -21.5, 25.5) which is currently not able to create automation-science-pack due to missing resources.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when connecting pipes
- Ensure that the positions of the entities you are trying to connect are valid and that there are no obstacles in between. Double-check the coordinates of the boiler and offshore pump to ensure they are correctly positioned for connection.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing. Check for existing entities in the target position.

### Errors related to missing resources
- When attempting to create items in the assembling machine, ensure that all required resources are available in the inventory to avoid item ingredient shortages.
